lead_paragraph: SALITAN--Mark, A.,on July 20, 2016 his 87th Birthday. Beloved husband of Adele, nee Wechsler for 60 years. Devoted father of Michael Salitan (David Kulick), Laurie Salitan (Marc Kushner), James Salitan (Martine Davis), Diane Egleston (Michael Egleston). Cherished grandfather of Emily, Gabe, Ana, Nora, Molly and Nathan. Chapel Service Friday at Eden Memorial Chapels, Inc. at 10:00am. For information www.edenmemorial.com or call (201) 947-EDEN. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  SALITAN, MARK, A.
